objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Mystery/Detective themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Mystery/Detective narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Mystery/Detective lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a mysterious problem to solve involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a mystery context
Students engage in mystery themed role-play about hobbies and free time using slang register
Students create original mystery themed content about hobbies and free time in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Mystery/Detective scenario?
What clue or investigation might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Mystery/Detective story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Mystery/Detective perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this mystery scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Mystery/Detective situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using slang register in mystery context
Character B: Responding in slang register within mystery theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with clue
hobbies and free time with investigation
hobbies and free time with suspect

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Mystery/Detective theme: Investigation, puzzles, solving problems

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Mystery/Detective themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
